name: R5-Bundle-R4-Bundle
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 Bundle into FHIR R4

target.comment: R5 `Bundle` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle`

element.display: Entry in the bundle - will have a resource or information

target.display: Entry in the bundle - will have a resource or information
target.comment: R5 `Bundle.entry` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.entry`

R5 `Bundle.entry.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Bundle.entry.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: URI for resource (e.g. the absolute URL server address, URI for UUID/OID, etc.)

target.display: URI for resource (Absolute URL server address or URI for UUID/OID)
target.comment: R5 `Bundle.entry.fullUrl` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.entry.fullUrl`
R5 `Bundle.entry.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.entry.id`
R5 `Bundle.entry.link` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.entry.link`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Bundle.entry.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Bundle.entry.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `Bundle.entry.request` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.entry.request`

R5 `Bundle.entry.request.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Bundle.entry.request.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `Bundle.entry.request.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.entry.request.id`
R5 `Bundle.entry.request.ifMatch` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.entry.request.ifMatch`
R5 `Bundle.entry.request.ifModifiedSince` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.entry.request.ifModifiedSince`
R5 `Bundle.entry.request.ifNoneExist` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.entry.request.ifNoneExist`
R5 `Bundle.entry.request.ifNoneMatch` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.entry.request.ifNoneMatch`

element.display: GET | HEAD | POST | PUT | DELETE | PATCH

target.display: GET | HEAD | POST | PUT | DELETE | PATCH
target.comment: R5 `Bundle.entry.request.method` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.entry.request.method` - method has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/http-verb|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/http-verb|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Bundle.entry.request.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Bundle.entry.request.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: URL for HTTP equivalent of this entry

target.display: URL for HTTP equivalent of this entry
target.comment: R5 `Bundle.entry.request.url` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.entry.request.url`
R5 `Bundle.entry.resource` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.entry.resource`
R5 `Bundle.entry.response` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.entry.response`

element.display: The Etag for the resource (if relevant)

target.display: The Etag for the resource (if relevant)
target.comment: R5 `Bundle.entry.response.etag` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.entry.response.etag`

R5 `Bundle.entry.response.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Bundle.entry.response.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `Bundle.entry.response.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.entry.response.id`
R5 `Bundle.entry.response.lastModified` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.entry.response.lastModified`

element.display: The location (if the operation returns a location)

target.display: The location (if the operation returns a location)
target.comment: R5 `Bundle.entry.response.location` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.entry.response.location`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Bundle.entry.response.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Bundle.entry.response.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: OperationOutcome with hints and warnings (for batch/transaction)

target.display: OperationOutcome with hints and warnings (for batch/transaction)
target.comment: R5 `Bundle.entry.response.outcome` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.entry.response.outcome`
R5 `Bundle.entry.response.status` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.entry.response.status`
R5 `Bundle.entry.search` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.entry.search`

R5 `Bundle.entry.search.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Bundle.entry.search.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `Bundle.entry.search.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.entry.search.id`

element.display: match | include - why this is in the result set

target.display: match | include | outcome - why this is in the result set
target.comment: R5 `Bundle.entry.search.mode` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.entry.search.mode` - mode has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/search-entry-mode|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/search-entry-mode|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Bundle.entry.search.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Bundle.entry.search.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `Bundle.entry.search.score` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.entry.search.score`
R5 `Bundle.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.id`
R5 `Bundle.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `Bundle.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.implicitRules`

R5 `Bundle.language` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `Bundle.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred; language has change due to type change: R5 `language` `code` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `language`
R5 `Bundle.link` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.link`

R5 `Bundle.link.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Bundle.link.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `Bundle.link.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.link.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Bundle.link.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Bundle.link.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

R5 `Bundle.link.relation` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Bundle.link.relation` - relation removed a binding requirement - Required http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/iana-link-relations|5.0.0; relation has change due to type change: R5 relation code has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 relation
R5 `Bundle.link.url` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.link.url`
R5 `Bundle.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.meta`
R5 `Bundle.signature` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Bundle.signature` - signature has change due to type change: R5 `signature` `Signature` maps as RelatedTo for R4 `signature`
R5 `Bundle.timestamp` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.timestamp`

element.display: If search, the total number of matches

target.display: If search, the total number of matches
target.comment: R5 `Bundle.total` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.total`

element.display: document | message | transaction | transaction-response | batch | batch-response | history | searchset | collection | subscription-notification

target.display: document | message | transaction | transaction-response | batch | batch-response | history | searchset | collection
target.comment: R5 `Bundle.type` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Bundle.type` - type has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/bundle-type|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/bundle-type|4.0.1 (Equivalent)
